author: George Delgado
description: A riff on the Southside using cucumber – an ingredient originally inspired by Hendrick's Gin having recently launched when this gin cocktail was first created.
name: Eastside Gimlet
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker
Add gin, lime juice, sugar syrup and mint, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
TOP with a splash of soda
